resources.string:
What is Sustainable Clark? It\’s you. It’s me. It\’s every one of us. We are all able to make a difference in the world — everything you do, every day, matters. 

Navigate through the app by clicking the menu at the top right. 

To see different resources on the map, click on Sustainable Map. 

To see a list of all resources by category, click on the Resources List. 

To help our app grow, click on Add Resource and go to the location where the resource is found.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
You will be redirected to the sign-in page and will have the option to sign back into the app

We hope you have enjoyed using the app! If you have run into any issues or have questions regarding this app or sustainability at Clark feel free to email Jenny Isler - Director of Sustainability at Clark.
This app was developed by two Clark Computer Science students in the fall of 2019. Charlie Poff-Webster (\’20) and Trevor Erwin-Stevens (\’20).
You have been flagged and are no longer allowed to add resources. For more information please email jisler@clarku.edu
